ExploreFact.Text: It's a ocean in motion! It's just a tad dark.

<color=lightblue>Enji</color> considers the method for getting inside the <color=orange>refinery</color> to be "slightly unorthodox".

ExploreFact.Text: I suddenly found myself in a strange chamber! How did I manage to get here?

AltText.Text: I entered an <color=orange>anglerfish</color> and wound up at <color=orange>Locomocean's refinery</color>!

ExploreFact.Text: I've found an <color=orange>Advanced Warp Core</color> containing <color=lightblue>Ghost Matter</color>. I ought to be careful with this...
<color=lightblue>Enji</color> was trying to meet a <color=yellow>two week</color> deadline, circumventing procedures and ignoring personal safety in favor of quick development.
An explosion occurred, causing a chunk of <color=lightblue>Ghost Matter</color> to pin <color=lightblue>Enji</color> down!
Despite being stuck, <color=lightblue>Enji</color> was still able to get supplies by using their <color=orange>remote drone</color>.
An <color=orange>anglerfish</color> destroyed the drone, forcing <color=lightblue>Enji</color> to ration their supplies.
After at least <color=yellow>three weeks</color> had passed, <color=lightblue>Enji</color> began to think that their clan wouldn't come find them.
Between withering away and attempting amputation, <color=lightblue>Enji</color> chose the former.
